Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory234.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'You little imp, take my Dragon Subduing!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao stands in a horse stance, one fist drawn to her waist and the other thrusting forward, accidentally knocking a glass off the table.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Oh! Commandant? You\'re here at the perfect time! Come check out my latest "cultivation" breakthrough!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Check this out! Turtle Strike!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'This I call the Roaming Dragon Arts!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "And there's more! The Ninefold Stealth Steps, Dark Abyss Mystic Palm...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Pulao moves with blinding speed, calling out exotic moves you've never even heard of."}
{2: 'Is this... some kind of new weapon from Kowloong?', 3: '23', 4: 'Been picking up some dance moves with Hanying lately?', 5: '25'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "That's right! It's this ancient, mystical weapon from Kowloong—the Immortal Cultivation Arts!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Not even close! This is the legendary power from Kowloong lore—the Immortal Cultivation Arts!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "See? The moves I just used all came from this book. It's loaded with all sorts of badass techniques!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You take the book from Pulao, its cover emblazoned with the title "Tales of Kowloong".'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "It's hands down the best one. The hero inside flies with his sword, soars through the skies, and dives underground—nothing he can't do!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "If I keep at it, I'll be able to do just like the hero in the book, achieving great things with all these powers!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao punches the air a few times, imagining herself as an enlightened master.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, she remembers something and pulls out a chair from the corner.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'By the way, I got this chair from an antique shop. The book says that the more mystical the artifact, the better it supports your cultivation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Commandant, want to test it out yourself? If you train with me, we could practice moves on each other and both get better!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hold on... this chair seems...', 3: '43'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory720.jpg'}
{3: 'You are cut off by a sudden blinding white light. As it dims, the familiar room vanishes, replaced by a strange new space.'}
{3: 'The sound of music, deep and resonant, fills the air, and then, words slowly appear before your eyes.'}
{1: 'Welcome to Immortal Cultivation...', 3: '75', 4: 'fee82aff'}
{3: 'Welcome to Immortal Cultivation...'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: '"Welcome to Immortal Cultivation... You have the option to accept the Primordial Power offered by the system, then set forth on your personal journey of cultivation..."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Is this the legendary "system\'s golden touch" mentioned in the book?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Fate has thrust the protagonist into the world of a cultivation novel, where they will rise from obscurity to ultimate immortality... I get it now, my story is about to begin!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No, wait... how could you know already?', 3: '63'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'I accept the Primordial Power! Hmm...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao steps forward, extends her arms, and shuts her eyes. Yet, moments pass with no change.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Huh? What about my Marrow Cleansing? And my Power Infusion?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Looks like there's some new update.", 3: '70'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Let's see... To wield the Primordial Power, the Destined One needs to select an assistant providing support through the system...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Realizing this, Pulao gradually shifts her gaze in your direction.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Um, Commandant... Heh, what do you think...?', 4: '1'}
{2: '...Alright.', 3: '75', 4: 'Sure, sure, go for it.', 5: '77'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Hehe, I always know you are the most dependable ally!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "The path of cultivation is no easy feat; I'm serious about this!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao declares her resolve as she follows the prompts to finalize the binding of her assistant, and the white light once again fills the space.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "I'm on my way! The realm of cultivation, prepare for the arrival of your next legend!", 4: '1'}
